subject: CNN.com June Update
body:
CNN.com June Update





Member Center















See the latest evolution of CNN.com





Starting July 1st, you'll be watching news in a whole new way at CNN.com. Until then, you're invited to preview the site and let us know what you think. Take a video tour of some new features and functions or simply explore the site. 

Look for the +Feedback links and make sure you get your opinion in before the preview ends.

Take the tour
Go to CNN.com beta






Is that for real?




				Naked cyclists protesting. Dogs employed by a Japanese nursing home. In the midst of covering essential breaking news, international stories and political coverage, occasionally CNN uncovers news that even journalists find hard to believe. Check out some of the head-scratching stories that you have to see to believe.
Lightening shreds man's pants
Golfer saves drowning dog
Nude cyclists pedal away

More offbeat stories and video








Angelina Jolie: fame, family and "A Might Heart"




				Tonight Angelina Jolie speaks with Larry King on playing Mariane Pearl, a real-life pregnant wife caught in a tragic tale of terror, in her new film, "A Might Heart."
Watch Larry King Live tonight at 9 p.m. ET


For highlights, watch Larry King's New weekly podcast, debuting tomorrow, Friday June 15.
Watch podcast
*load time may vary

Sign up to receive The Daily Top 10 e-mail, CNN.com's most popular stories and videos of the day.




He said what?




Ask Headline News' Glenn Beck anything and chances are he'll either know the answer or lie so convincingly that you won't ever know the difference. His weekly podcast, Sick Twisted Freak, gives him yet another platform to give his own unique take on everything from world events and politics to pop culture and everyday hassles.
